A "Movie Marathon" festival where attendees can watch multiple films back-to-back in a single day or weekend, with breaks for food and rest in between.
A "Cultural Film Festival" that showcases films from different countries and cultures, with who can share their cultural experiences through their films.
A "Horror Film Festival" that features the best horror films from around the world, with live performances and screenings in a haunted location.
A "Family Film Festival" that focuses on family-friendly films and activities, such as screenings, workshops, and games.
A "Virtual Film Festival" that allows attendees to watch films from the comfort of their own homes, with interactive elements such as live Q&A sessions with filmmakers and virtual meet-and-greets.
